name: Donald Trump
summary: Donald John Trump (born June 14, 1946) is the 45th and current President of the United States, in office since January 20, 2017.

partners.name: Ivana Trump
partners.summary: Ivana Marie Trump (née Zelníčková, Czech: [ˈzɛlɲiːtʃkovaː]; born February 20, 1949) is a Czech-American businesswoman, former fashion model, author, and television personality.

children.name: Donald Trump Jr.
children.summary: Donald John Trump Jr. (born December 31, 1977) is an American businessman and former reality TV personality. He is the oldest child of the 45th President of the United States, Donald Trump, and his first wife, Ivana.

children.name: Ivanka Trump
children.summary: Ivana Marie "Ivanka" Trump (; born October 30, 1981) is an American television personality, fashion designer, author and businesswoman who is an advisor to the President of the United States, Donald Trump.

partners.name: Jared Kushner
partners.summary: Jared Corey Kushner (born January 10, 1981) is an American investor, real-estate developer, and newspaper publisher who is currently senior advisor to his father-in-law, Donald Trump, the President of the United States.

children.name: Eric Trump
children.summary: Jared Corey Kushner (born January 10, 1981) is an American investor, real-estate developer, and newspaper publisher who is currently senior advisor to his father-in-law, Donald Trump, the President of the United States.

partners.name: Marla Maples
partners.summary: Marla Ann Maples (born October 27, 1963) is an American actress and television personality. Maples was also the second wife of Donald Trump (1993-1999)

partners.name: Melania Trump
partners.summary: Melania Trump (; born Melanija Knavs; [mɛˈlaːnija ˈknaːu̯s], Germanized to Melania Knauss; April 26, 1970) is the current First Lady of the United States and third wife of the 45th President of the United States, Donald Trump.
